job.name: TpcRS
job.command: # source ~/.tcshrc cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv NODEBUG yes # starver .DEV2 setup 64b setenv STARFPE NO set evtsFile = $INPUTFILE0; set file = `basename $evtsFile .daq` echo "${evtsFile}" if (! -r ${evtsFile}) exit 1; set logFile = ${file}.ClnoW.log set rootF = ${file}.ClnoW.root # set f=`find . -maxdepth 1 -type f -name "${file}*.root"` # if ("$f" == "") then if (! -r $rootF) then root.exe -q -b 'bfc.C(99999,"in,mysql,tpcDb,detDb,StEvent,TpxAvLaser,nodefault","'${evtsFile}'","","'$rootF'")' > ${logFile} endif
